Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near Garfield/Damen
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Damen, 51st, Western and 55th: due to, fire department activity near Garfield/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Damen, 51st, Western, 55th and over regular route due to fire department activity near Garfield/Damen.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
